pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake Update 13 (2201.13.1) Swan Lake Update 13 (2201.13.1) is the first patch release of Ballerina 2201.13.0 (Swan Lake Update 13). This patch includes several workspace-related fixes that enhance the functionality of the Low Code view. ## Update Ballerina Run the command below to update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.13.1 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/). ``` $ bal dist pull 2201.13.1 ``` ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, then, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install.
